hw2

Class TennisMatch

  • java.lang.Object
    • hw2.TennisMatch

  • public class TennisMatch
extends java.lang.Object
    This class simulates a tennis match. This was created as a Computer Science assignment in my COM S 227 Class at Iowa State University
    Author:
    Christian Lisle

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TennisMatch(java.lang.String p1Name, java.lang.String p2Name, boolean playBestOfThree, int initialServer, int initialServerEnd)
      Create a new tennis match.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TennisMatch

        public TennisMatch(java.lang.String p1Name,
                   java.lang.String p2Name,
                   boolean playBestOfThree,
                   int initialServer,
                   int initialServerEnd)
        Create a new tennis match.
        Parameters:
        p1Name - Player 1 name
        p2Name - Player 2 name
        playBestOfThree - Match is best-of-3-sets if true; else best-of-5
        initialServer - Specifies which player serves first
        initialServerEnd - Specifies which end the initial server starts on

    • Method Detail

      • serve

        public void serve()
        Serves the ball. Does nothing if the game is over.

      • fault

        public void fault()
        Registers a serve fault. Does nothing if the ball is not being served. Two serve faults yield a game point for the receiver

      • returnBall

        public void returnBall()
        Reverses the direction of the ball. Ball is no longer being served. Does nothing if the ball is not in play

      • failedReturn

        public void failedReturn()
        Takes the ball out of play. The player who last served or returned the ball scores a game point

      • let

        public void let()
        Ends the current point early without a point being scored

      • changeEnds

        public void changeEnds()
        Swaps the ends of the two players

      • changeServer

        public void changeServer()
        Swaps the server and receiver

      • incrementGamePoints

        public void incrementGamePoints(TennisPlayer addTo,
                                TennisPlayer noAdd)
        Adds one game point to addTo's game total. Zeros game score and increments set score if game has ended. Removes ball from play. Clears faults
        Parameters:
        addTo - The player who has scored a point
        noAdd - The other player

      • incrementSetPoints

        public void incrementSetPoints(TennisPlayer addTo,
                               TennisPlayer noAdd)
        Adds one set point to addTo's total. Zeros set score and increments match score if set has ended. Changes server. Changes ends after odd numbered sets
        Parameters:
        addTo - The player who has scored a point
        noAdd - The other player

      • incrementMatchPoints

        public void incrementMatchPoints(TennisPlayer addTo,
                                 TennisPlayer noAdd)
        Adds one match point to addTo's total. Sets game over if match has ended
        Parameters:
        addTo - The player who has scored a point
        noAdd - The other player

      • getGameScore

        public java.lang.String getGameScore()
        Returns the game score p1-p2, Advantage name, or Deuce
        Returns:
        The game score

      • getSetScore

        public java.lang.String getSetScore()
        Returns the set score p1-p2
        Returns:
        The set score

      • getMatchScore

        public java.lang.String getMatchScore()
        Returns the match score p1-p2
        Returns:
        The match score

      • getScore

        public java.lang.String getScore()
        Returns the full game, set, and match score
        Returns:
        game, set, and match score

      • setGameScore

        public void setGameScore(int p1Game,
                         int p2Game)
        Set the game score
        Parameters:
        p1Game - Player 1's new game score
        p2Game - Player 2's new game score

      • setSetScore

        public void setSetScore(int p1Set,
                        int p2Set)
        Sets the set score
        Parameters:
        p1Set - Player 1's new set score
        p2Set - Player 2's new set score

      • setMatchScore

        public void setMatchScore(int p1Match,
                          int p2Match)
        Sets the match score
        Parameters:
        p1Match - Player 1's new match score
        p2Match - Player 2's new match score

      • setScore

        public void setScore(int p1Game,
                     int p2Game,
                     int p1Set,
                     int p2Set,
                     int p1Match,
                     int p2Match)
        Set the game, set, and match scores
        Parameters:
        p1Game - Player 1's new game score
        p2Game - Player 2's new game score
        p1Set - Player 1's new set score
        p2Set - Player 2's new set score
        p1Match - Player 1's new match score
        p2Match - Player 2's new match score

      • getBestOfThree

        public boolean getBestOfThree()
        Returns bestOfThree
        Returns:
        bestOfThree Whether or not the game is best of three. True for best of three, false for best of five
